name: Hotel Europe

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I just got back from a surprise weekend trip to Minsk with my husband; he just knows how much I love Minsk. One of the many wonderful surprises he had in store for me on this perfect weekend was booking the hotel Europe, as I have always wanted to stay here. It was an amazing experience! Our room was very modern, spacious and had a huge bathroom. The view from our room was just spectacular –hotel is located straight in the city centre, close to the old part of the city. Service was great. If you’ve been in Minsk before you probably noticed that people are wonderful but in the hotels, restaurants and bars quality of service is not the best, you will be lucky to get a smile and don’t expect to hear hello or goodbye. Hotel Europe proved us wrong - our outstanding memory will be of the staff - helpful, knowledgeable and anticipating our every wish. Front desk girls were so brilliant, check in and check out took us less than 5 min and they were delighted to answer any of our questions. Oksana, front office manager, speaks perfect English and has a great sense of humour; she always has a smile on her face. Hotel’s restaurant was quite an experience. The waiters were wonderful and attentive. The food was nice and delicately presented. Bar service was outstanding, great cocktails and selection of wine. Overall we had such a great time that we are already planning our next trip to Minsk and you know where we will be staying :) If you want a bit of luxury and relaxation – this hotel is a perfect choice. I would recommend this hotel for a romantic week-end or business trip, as the location is spot on.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel!

reviews.text: Presently Hotel Europe is the best Hotel in Minsk, far better than the 2 - 3* Hotel Minsk. Hotel Europe offers international 4* standard at 5* prices. The Hotel is clean and new - but quite cold styled. The rooms are quite big, the breakfast nicely arranged and there's always enough hot water (in contrast to Hotel Minsk), even at high floors.
reviews.title: International 4* standard

reviews.text: L'Europe is an brandnew hotel in the centre of Minsk. Architecture fits to the old place where it is located.
reviews.title: Surprised!

description: Hotel Europe, first five-star hotel in Minsk, is filled with elegance and charm and is ideally located both for tourist and business purposes. Its warm and intimate atmosphere makes every guest feel unique and privileged. The hotel's multi-lingual staff provides guests with gracious around-the-clock service, and anticipates their every need. The Hotel is not large, exclusive and distinguished by the elegance in facade and decor and perfection of its furnishing and standard of service.
